description: Fill in this template for each new consultant. Run with: ./provision-avd-users.sh users.json

_fieldGuide.personalEmail: Required - For password reset and notifications. NOT the work email (that gets created)
_fieldGuide.phoneNumber: Optional - For MFA SMS backup. Include country code
_fieldGuide.customerAssignment: Required - Which customer they work for. Must match existing customer group
_fieldGuide.startDate: Optional - YYYY-MM-DD format. Account created but disabled until this date
_fieldGuide.notes: Optional - Internal notes, not visible to user

_whatGetsCreated.mfa: Required - user sets up on first login
_whatGetsCreated.fslogixProfile: Created automatically on first AVD login
